tgt_original: kṣāntibalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 3 ||
vīryabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 4 ||
dhyānabalekṣaka śruyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 5 ||
dānabalena samudgatabuddho dānabalādhipatā narasiṃhe |  dānabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 1 ||
śīlabalekṣaka śrūyati śabdaḥ kāruṇikena pure praviśantam || 2 ||
